dialog.eventText: There's a burger on the ground with grease soaking through the wrapper. Should you eat it or ignore it?

You unwrap the burger and throw the greasy wrapper behind you. The fact that you found a warm burger sitting in a damp cave makes you feel a bit paranoid. But your overwhelming feelings of gluttony are far more powerful. With a shrug, you dig in.

You try your hardest to ignore the burger, but your hunger gets the best of you. You unwrap the greasy burger, salivating on queue as the smell of processed beef smothered in mayonnaise fills your nostrils. You've already unwrapped it, might as well eat it while it's still warm. The fact that you found a warm burger sitting in a damp cave makes you feel a bit paranoid. But your overwhelming feelings of gluttony are far more powerful. With a shrug, you dig in.
You decide to store the burger for later. With a few taps on your wristwatch, the burger dissolves into 1s and 0s, storing itself in your digital inventory.

You finish the burger in a matter of seconds. A burp escapes your lips and echos throughout the cavern. Normally you'd surpress it but you felt comfortable that nobody would be around to hear your burp. You pat your distended belly, feeling uncomfortably full. You've eaten many a burger in your day, but never felt this full afterwards. Hopefully you'll be able to walk it off...
You ignore the burger and carry on your path.
